trans-unit.source: Provides data for several of the events that are associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Stylus"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för flera av de händelser som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Stylus"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The StylusEventArgs class provides data for the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusUp> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInAirMove> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInRange> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusOutOfRange> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotStylusCapture> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostStylusCapture> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusUp> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusMove> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInAirMove> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInRange> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusOutOfRange> (as well as equivalent events declared on the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> class).
trans-unit.target: Klassen StylusEventArgs innehåller data för följande händelser:- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusUp>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInAirMove>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusEnter>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusLeave>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInRange>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusOutOfRange>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotStylusCapture>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostStylusCapture>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusUp>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusMove>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInAirMove>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInRange>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusOutOfRange>(samt motsvarande händelser som har deklarerats i den <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>klassen).</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusOutOfRange> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInRange> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInAirMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostStylusCapture> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotStylusCapture> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusOutOfRange> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInRange> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusLeave> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusEnter> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInAirMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusUp>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The stylus to associate with the event.
trans-unit.target: Pennan ska associeras med händelsen.

trans-unit.source: The time when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den tid när händelsen inträffar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar positionen för pennan.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that the (`x`,`y`) coordinates are mapped to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> som den (`x`,`y`) koordinater är mappade till.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the position of the stylus, based on the coordinates of relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: En som anger positionen från pennan, baserat på koordinaterna för relativeTo .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects relative to the specified input element.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> som innehåller <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objekt i förhållande till den angivna indataelementet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> som den (`x,y`) samordnar i den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> mappas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected in the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> som innehåller <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objekt som samlas in i händelsen.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that uses the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects relating to the specified input element.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> som använder den angivna <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> och innehåller <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objekt som är relaterade till den angivna indataelementet.

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` must be compatible with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> method.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`måste vara kompatibel med den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>från den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> before calling the GetStylusPoints method.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>metod för att hämta en <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>innan du anropar metoden GetStylusPoints.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > GetStylusPoints uses constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > GetStylusPoints använder villkor från den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>i <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>, även om begränsningarna i `subsetToReformatTo` är olika.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> values of 0 and 1023 but <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> uses values of 0 and 255, GetStylusPoints returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> containing the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om `subsetToReformatTo` använder <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>värden 0 och 1 023 men <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>använder värden 0 och 255, GetStylusPoints returnerar en <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>som innehåller värdena 0 och 255.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> som den (`x,y`) samordnar i den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> mappas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected during an event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> som innehåller <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objekt samlas in under en händelse.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is in proximity to, but not touching, the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om pennan är närhet till, men inte röra digitizer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the stylus is in proximity to, but not touching, the digitizer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om pennan i närhet till, men inte röra, digitizer; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus in inverted.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om pennan i inverteras.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the stylus is inverted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om pennan inverterad; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Anropar händelsehanterare på ett sätt för typspecifika, vilket kan öka effektiviteten för händelsen system.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen kastar generiska hanteraren som en <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler>och aktiverar det.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den här implementeringen mönstret och skälen för den finns <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>och [dirigerade händelser översikt](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Allmän hanteraren att anropa på typspecifika sätt.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: Målet att anropa hanteraren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref> that represents the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref> som representerar pennan.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref> that represents the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref> som representerar pennan.
